code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import InputWithError from'../../../../animations/input-error-field';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TopicEnter=_ref=>{let{TOPIC}=_ref;const[topic_name,setTopic_name]=useState(TOPIC.topicName);const[error,setError]=useState(false);const[warning,setWarning]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{try{TOPIC.topicName=topic_name;}catch(error){if(error.message=='пустое значение'){setWarning(true);}else if(error.message=='неверное значение'){setError(true);}}},[topic_name]);const activateHint=value=>{setTopic_name(value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase-annotation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"1/9"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"\u041A\u0430\u043A \u043D\u0430\u0437\u0432\u0430\u0442\u044C \u0437\u0430\u0434\u0430\u0447\u0443?"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"createTopic-phase-inputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputWithError,{placeholder:"Сантехника",value:topic_name,setValue:setTopic_name,error:error,setError:setError,errorText:'Не верное значение',warning:warning,setWarning:setWarning,warningText:'Заполните поле'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-hints",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"hint",onClick:()=>activateHint("Сантехника"),children:"\u0421\u0430\u043D\u0442\u0435\u0445\u043D\u0438\u043A"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"hint",onClick:()=>activateHint("Ремонт"),children:"\u0420\u0435\u043C\u043E\u043D\u0442"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"hint",onClick:()=>activateHint("Срочно"),children:"\u0421\u0440\u043E\u0447\u043D\u043E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"hint",onClick:()=>activateHint("Дистанционно"),children:"\u0414\u0438\u0441\u0442\u0430\u043D\u0446\u0438\u043E\u043D\u043D\u043E"})]})]})]});};export default TopicEnter;
